Docs.summary: The namespace is the .NET Framework Data Provider for the Entity Framework.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `EntityClient` provider uses storage-specific [!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/includes/vstecado-md.md)] Data Provider classes and mapping metadata for interacting with entity data models. `EntityClient` translates operations performed on conceptual entities into operations performed on physical data sources. It translates result sets returned from physical data sources into conceptual entities.
> [!NOTE] > For more information about how to use this namespace in [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] applications, see [ADO.NET Entity Framework](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/index.md).
